document.masterDocTitle: The genus Brechmorhoga Kirby, 1894, in the West Indies, with a proposed new status for Brechmorhoga archboldi (Donnelly) (Odonata; Libellulidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Brechmorhoga Kirby, 1894, in the West Indies, with a proposed new status for Brechmorhoga archboldi (Donnelly) (Odonata; Libellulidae)

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–4.
Brechmorhoga praecox grenadensis
: (1) male, Guadeloupe, Sainte-Rose, Sofaïa, habitus. (2) head, frontal view. (3) (4) male, abdomen S6–10 and cerci, lateral view.

FIGURES 5–8.
Brechmorhoga praecox grenadensis
: (5) male, Martinique, Absalon, Trace Duclos, habitus. (6) head, frontal view. (7) (8) male, abdomen S6–10 and cerci, lateral view.

FIGURES 9–10.
Brechmorhoga praecox grenadensis
: (9) female, Martinique, Absalon, Trace Duclos, habitus. (10) female, St Lucia, Praslin Parish, Mahaut, habitus. (11) male, Grenada, Tufton Hall, Saumache River habitus. (12) head, frontal view. (13) (14) male, abdomen S6–10 and cerci, lateral view. 15 female, Grenada, Tufton Hall, habitus.
Brechmorhoga praecox praecox
: (16) male Mexico, Veracruz, habitus. (17) head, frontal view. (18) (19) male, abdomen S6–10 and cerci, lateral view. (20) female, Trinidad, Oropuche, habitus.
Brechmorhoga praecox postlobata :
(21) male, Mexico, Colima, Salada, habitus. (22) male, abdomen S6–10 and cerci, lateral view.

FIGURES 11–14.
Brechmorhoga praecox grenadensis

FIGURES 15.
Brechmorhoga praecox grenadensis
: female, Grenada, Tufton Hall, habitus.

subSubSection.paragraph: Legs . Trochanters and coxae pale brown. Anterior femora entirely brown, blackish apically, tibiae and tarsi black. Proximal half of mesothoracic femora pale brown, metathoracic femora almost entirely dark brown, distal half black, tibiae and tarsi black; 12 spurs on hind femora, first 9 small and equal in size, distal 3 grouped, all teeth distinctly acute and erect.
Wings . Hyaline, sometimes tinged with amber along front margin in Fw, from base to nodus in Hw; pterostigma black.
Dimensions. Males (n= 4 ): Total length 44.0– 45.1 ; abdomen 32.5 –33.0; Fw 31.0– 31.5 ; Hw 31.0–32.0. Females (n= 2 ): Total length 42.0– 43.5 ; abdomen 32.5 –33.0; Fw 31.0–33.0; Hw 31.0– 32.5 .
